sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Footer.css"; import Logo from "../assets/logos.avif"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; const Footer = () => { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); return ( <>
{/* FOOTER START */}
{/* for company name and description */}
{/*

MSB Makina

*/} {/* */}

{t('footer.paragraph')}

{/* for quick links */}

{t('footer.quickLinks')}

{/*for the underline */}
  • {t('footer.home')}
    •
  • {t('footer.search')}
    •
  • {t('footer.contacts')}
    •
  • {t('footer.aboutus')}
    •
{/* for some other links */}

{t('footer.services')}

{/*for the underline */}
  • {t('footer.grainSampler')}
    •
  • {t('footer.electrical')}
    •
  • {t('footer.mechanical')}
    •
  • {t('footer.transportation')}
    •
{/* for contact us info */}

{t('footer.contacts')}

  • +90-542 681 78 67
  • +90-532 287 21 85
  • msbteknikelektrik@gmail.com
  • Çubuk/Ankara, Turkey
  • {t('footer.whatsapp')}
  • {t('footer.instagram')}
{/* for social links */}
{/* Footer Bottom start */}
{t('footer.copyright')} © MSB Makina 2022.
); }; export default Footer;
